front.title: •Allegiant General Pryde
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Hux is forfeit -3. While with a Resistance character, adds one battle destiny. While Emperor on table, attrition against opponent here is +1 for each First Order character here (limit +3).

rulings: The limit of +3 is only a limit on how much Pryde can add, not other cards.
